chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 Pro is having the following problem:
The delivery person called me, but I couldn't answer because I was at home. They didn't show up.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

Can you try to ask the carrier to deliver the package today please because he will leave abroad tomorrow ?

Regards,
Marry from the Back Care Team.

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link below, the parcel should be delivered by 24 May.
https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=GH202859441JB&langue=fr_FR

Regards,
JY
